attributes.action: Bring Back Our Old Schools System
attributes.additional_details:
Today we have an education system that is trying to follow the American way.
We are the UK and the education system we had pre Margret Thatcher was the finest in the world, but now with these so called changes to academies and colleages our education system is failing.
America as the highest failure rate in the world in education.
Return the schools to schools.
